participant_1.background:

I spend my day trying to stay away from cigarettes and doing things that make me happy.
i can t live without my friends.

participant_2.background:
Not really, I'd rather wear comfortable clothing.
I take my cats for walks along the beach to break the monotony of my life.
I enjoy helping my sister Madonna with her beauty business and selling cosmetics.
I found a hidden cave in the mountains while hiking with my dogs.
I'm feeling nostalgic today, so I'm going to watch some old movies from my childhood.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
I'm feeling nostalgic today, so I'm going to watch some old movies from my childhood. What are you up to?
I'm spending my day trying to stay away from cigarettes and doing things that make me happy.
That's good to hear. Do you have any hobbies?
I like to collect little figurines. I also like to tell stories about my grandparents to my children to keep their memory alive.
That's really sweet. I like to take my cats for walks along the beach to break the monotony of my life.
That sounds like a nice way to relax. Do you have any other hobbies?
Yes, I enjoy helping my sister Madonna with her beauty business and selling cosmetics.
That's great! I'm glad you have some fun hobbies to keep you busy.
Thank you! I'm glad to hear that you're staying away from cigarettes. It's a good habit to have
